cond.msg: This skill is only available when your HP is at 30 percent or lower.
This skill is only available when your HP is at 30 percent or lower.
Banish Seraph cannot be used due to unsuitable terms.
Rush cannot be used due to unsuitable terms.
Storm Assault cannot be used due to unsuitable terms.
Shoulder Charge cannot be used due to unsuitable terms.
Blade Rush cannot be used due to unsuitable terms.
